analysis.description:

	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#16-18)

BlocklancerToken.TimeLeft (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#155-161) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- fundingEnd > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#159-161)

BlocklancerToken.TimeLeftBeforeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#162-170) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- fundingStart > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#167-170)

BlocklancerToken.getExchangeRate (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#215-229) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- fundingStart + 1 * 86400 > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#217-229)

BlocklancerToken.ICOopen (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#230-241) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > fundingEnd (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#237-241)
	- block.timestamp < fundingStart (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#236-241)

BlocklancerToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#244-282) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < fundingStart (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#248-250)
	- block.timestamp > fundingEnd (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#251)

BlocklancerToken.finalize (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#284-312) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp <= fundingEnd || totalTokens < tokenCreationMin) && (totalTokens + 5000000000000000000000) < tokenCreationCap (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#292-296)

BlocklancerToken.refund (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#315-335) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= fundingEnd (/unique_chucks/10/0x9ea80e204045329ba752d03c395f82a12799f13d.sol#321)
